name: Nightmare Collection: Telephone Call
description:
Wishlist on Steam!


Nightmare Collection is a set of unique and atmospheric horror games.
The story of Telephone Call is about receiving a strange phone call during a party.

Key features:
  • Atmospheric horror.
  • American theme: environment inspired by American horror films.
  • VHS film aesthetics.
  • Psychological horror.
  • AutoSave: Automatically saves each chapter.

Play Time:
  • 15-30 min.
